content: under the wreath cover between the lights my set of rainbow gnomes would like a string of fairy lights for christmas abbreviations st / sts stitch / stitches k knit kb knit into the back of the stitch m1 make 1 by lifting the thread before the next stitch and knitting into the back of it ssk slip two stitches knitwise or knitwise followed by purlwise one at a time insert tip of left needle into stitches from above yarn round right needle and knit both stitches together k2tog knit two stitches together © frankie brown 2023 mypatterns areforpersonaluseonlyandshouldnotbeusedtoknititems forsale pleasedonotusethemforteachingpurposes withoutmypermission 3
